scripts.dev: JEKYLL_ENV=development ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --watch --mode development | bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.build: JEKYLL_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production | bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.serve: JEKYLL_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production | bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run push && npm run invalidate
